# discord_guild_emoji (Resource)

Manages a Discord guild emoji.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# Manage a custom guild emoji
resource "discord_guild_emoji" "example" {
  guild_id = "123456789012345678" # Replace with your guild ID
  name     = "my_emoji"

  # Base64-encoded image data URI (required on create, forces replacement if changed)
  image = "data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUg..."

  # Optional: restrict emoji usage to specific roles
  roles = [
    discord_role.member.id,
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `guild_id` (String) The ID of the guild this emoji belongs to.
- `image` (String) The base64 encoded image for the emoji (data URI scheme). Only used on create.
- `name` (String) The name of the emoji.

### Optional

- `roles` (Set of String) Set of role IDs allowed to use this emoji.

### Read-Only

- `animated` (Boolean) Whether the emoji is animated.
- `available` (Boolean) Whether the emoji is available for use.
- `id` (String) The ID of the emoji.
